cleaned_text: Wellness Alert: LA's Best New Places To Get Your Wellness On Los Angeles has long been the authority on wellness trends. It's in LA, after all, that wellness concepts of all varieties find their home and ultimately take flight. But with juice bars and yoga studios on seemingly every corner, how do you cut through the noise and find the best places to get your wellness on? These 9 new wellness centers will help you invigorate your wellness routine. Pause Pause Reach a deeper state of relaxation at [Pause Float Studio](http://pausefloatstudio.com/). Located in the trendy Venice area, Pause brings patrons a transformative hour-long floatation therapy experience. With its watercolor mural and wooden wares crafted by local artisans, it will be hard to leave. In your own private float room listen to guided meditation, or float in peace partially submerged in ten inches of water blended with 1,000 pounds of epsom salts. During floatation therapy, many [reach new heights of self-actualization.](http://pausefloatstudio.com/science/) Once the hour's complete, you'll emerge regenerated, euphoric, and ready for a cup of tea in their quiet reflection room. [Pause Float Studio, 13353 Washington Blvd., Los Angeles, CA, USA](https://www.google.com/maps/place/pause+float+studio/@33.992701,-118.446083,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2ba8bdecc12b5:0x24e8228c04d76886!8m2!3d33.992701!4d-118.443889?shorturl=1) +310 439 1972 Create Yoga Yoga Studio [Create Yoga](https://www.createyoga.com/)is Santa Monica's best new yoga, meditation, and creativity studio. With Create's spacious Santa Monica Blvd. storefront, the wellness-minded can now connect over daily Ashtanga, Kundalini, Vinyasa and Hatha yoga classes or Sunday evening art and wine events. Aiming to disrupt the sometimes serious Los Angeles yoga studio culture, Create works to inspire and engage the community, offering a plethora of workshops and even the saucy Sexy Sunday Candle Lit Partner Flow. Visit Create Yoga for a real community driven yoga experience. Flower Child Restaurant, American [Flower Child](http://www.iamaflowerchild.com/)charged with the mission to provide 'healthy food for a happy world'? Part of a flourishing chain, Flower Child's Santa Monica location offers delectable fare that is locally sourced and always cooked fresh. All proteins in dishes like the Late Riser bowl and the The Rebel wrap are raised naturally and without additives. Best of all, Flower Child is vegan, vegetarian, and gluten free friendly! The Class Taryn Toomey's [The Class](http://taryntoomey.com/) has been lauded as one of New York's hottest fitness crazes. Thankfully, Los Angeles recently welcomed Toomey's pumping, spirit-cleansing classes to its must-do list as well. A 75 minute 'cathartic mind body experience', The Class strives to break down 'sludge', or layers in the body where stress and emotional damage are held. Through fluid movement, The Class helps to lay the foundation for a lean body, clear mind, and vibrant soul. With the tagline 'peace through strength', visitors to The Class claim to make emotional, physical, and spiritual breakthroughs. Keep an eye on the The Class [calendar](http://taryntoomey.com/los-angeles/) as this powerful experience moves around throughout the week. Take a spin to find your perfect small-group trip destination Passports ready? [View Trip](#) Arbor Vitae Wellness Center Arbor Vitae Wellness Center Tend to all of your wellness needs in one place at Santa Monica's [Arbor Vitae Wellness Center](http://www.arborvitaewellness.com/). Arbor Vitae's team of practitioners provide chiropractic and naturopathic care, ayurveda, cupping, massage, and acupuncture. The AV team's services can provide relief for anxiety, chronic stress, and pain. Request Dr. Lindsay Wagner to achieve spinal health bliss through chiropractic adjustments and cupping or acupunturist Brigita Slekys, L.Ac to experience Eastern medicine at its finist. Each practitioner in the AV office is dedicated to helping their patients achieve holistic wellness and feel their absolute best. Interested in trying facial cupping? Ask for Brigita. [1821 Wilshire Elixirs You might think if you've tried one LA juice bar you've tried them all. What sets [Lifehouse Tonics and Elixir](http://www.lifehousetonics.com/) apart is that it's not a juice bar — it's so much more. Lifehouse offers something truly unique in the tapestry of Los Angeles wellness beverage providers. Their drinks are jam-packed with potent Chinese herbs, medicinal mushrooms, and Ayurvedic favorites, all meant to enhance health, longevity, and vivacity. Incorporating some of wellness's hottest buzz ingredients like Reishi, Maca, and Ashwagandha, Lifehouse Tonics and Elixirs sets out to create equanimity and support your body to operate at its highest function. [7515 Sunset Blvd., Los Angeles, CA, USA](https://www.google.com/maps/place/lifehouse+tonics+%2b+elixirs/@34.098122,-118.355521,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2bedc3faa6fc3:0x9333a3c1fb3b78cc!8m2!3d34.098122!4d-118.353327?shorturl=1) +323 378 5691 BeefSteak BeefSteak [BeefSteak](http://www.beefsteakveg.com/) is both vegan and unrestricted diet friendly, and boasts a menu loaded with culinary crafts such as The K-Town Bowl, featuring kimchi, toasted seaweed, and a ginger gochujang dressing, as well as a gluten-free Ganache Tart. Expert Chef Marcel Vigneron gathers local ingredients from 'socially conscious purveyors' to concoct ecologically responsible, sustainable, and delicious dishes that fit perfectly in the relaxed California-chic atmosphere of the restaurant. When dining, remeber that wellness begins from the inside out. [BeefSteak, 7661 Melrose Ave., Los Angeles, CA, USA](https://www.google.com/maps/place/beefsteak/@34.0839133,-118.358972,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2bed26f2dda8d:0xb614cec3b5e89a3a!8m2!3d34.0839133!4d-118.356778?shorturl=1) +323 424 7442 Conscious Family Dinner Though this wellness celebration may not have a specific location, the buzz around LA's Conscious Family Dinner is on the rise. An evening free of alcohol and filled to the brim with self-improvement, [Conscious Family Dinner](http://integralfitness.org/) brings together some of Los Angeles' most phenomenal healers, [massage therapists](http://www.soothe.com), and teachers for an evening of betterment. Modeled as a mini-festival, each gathering welcomes about 200 people interested in things like laughter therapy, vegan fare, and self-healing. Organizer Benjamin Rolnik says Conscious Family Dinner works to ' [create a magical environment for guests to feel welcome, safe, and empowered](http://www.wellandgood.com/good-advice/sober-social-events-trend-wellness/)'. Olive & June Olive & June No stranger to LA's self-care aficionados, the blogger favorite [Olive & June](http://oliveandjune.com) opened the doors to its breezy Santa Monica Montana Avenue location earlier this year. Looking to take some time to yourself or chat over organic tea with friends during a distinct nail care experience? Olive & June is your place. Ask for the 'The Margot' to be indulged in luxurious, organic products sourced from California. And don't worry, their cleaning products are ecofriendly and their location is very Instagramable. [Olive & June Santa Monica, 1426 Montana Ave., Santa Monica, CA, USA](https://www.google.com/maps/place/olive+%26+june/@34.0880295,-118.4532662,11z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1solive+and+juen+santa+monica!3m4!1s0x80c2a4b11043d769:0x335924282c5aaa1a!8m2!3d34.0325761!4d-118.4943198?shorturl=1) +310 899 1029 Volcanic Iceland Epic Trip meet our Local Insider Hanna HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN A GUIDE? 2 years. WHAT DO YOU LOVE ABOUT YOUR JOB? It's the personal contact, the personal experiences. I love meeting people from all over the world... I really like getting to know everyone and feeling like I'm traveling with a group of friends. WHAT DESTINATION IS ON YOUR TRAVEL BUCKET-LIST? I have so many places on my list, but I would really lobe to go to Africa. I consider myself an "adventure girl" and Africa feels like the ULTIMATE adventure! Every CULTURE TRIP Small-group adventure is led by a Local Insider just like Hanna. KEEN TO EXPLORE THE WORLD? Connect with like-minded people on our premium trips curated by local insiders and with care for the world Since you are here, we would like to share our vision for the future of travel - and the direction Culture Trip is moving in. Culture Trip launched in 2011 with a simple yet passionate mission: to inspire people to go beyond their boundaries and experience what makes a place, its people and its culture special and meaningful — and this is still in our DNA today. We are proud that, for more than a decade, millions like you have trusted our award-winning recommendations by people who deeply understand what makes certain places and communities so special. Increasingly we believe the world needs more meaningful, real-life connections between curious travellers keen to explore the world in a more responsible way. That is why we have intensively curated a collection of premium small-group trips as an invitation to meet and connect with new, like-minded people for once-in-a-lifetime experiences in three categories: [Culture Trips,](/culture-trips) [Rail Trips](/rail-trips) and [ Private Trips.](/private-trips) Our Trips are suitable for both solo travelers, couples and friends who want to explore the world together. [Culture Trips](/culture-trips) are deeply immersive 5 to 16 days itineraries, that combine authentic local experiences, exciting activities and 4-5* accommodation to look forward to at the end of each day. Our [Rail Trips](/rail-trips) are our most planet-friendly itineraries that invite you to take the scenic route, relax whilst getting under the skin of a destination. Our [Private Trips](/private-trips) are fully tailored itineraries, curated by our Travel Experts specifically for you, your friends or your family. We know that many of you worry about the environmental impact of travel and are looking for ways of expanding horizons in ways that do minimal harm - and may even bring benefits. We are committed to go as far as possible in curating our trips with care for the planet. That is why all of our trips are flightless in destination, fully carbon offset - and we have ambitious plans to be net zero in the very near future.
